meanings.definition: The outermost layer of cells in an embryo.
meanings.sent1: During development, the exoderm protects the growing embryo.
meanings.sent2: The exoderm is crucial for the early stages of embryo formation.
meanings.sent3: The exoderm cells throw a tiny party to celebrate being the outermost layer.
meanings.sent4: Like a shield, the exoderm shields the delicate inner cells of the embryo.
meanings.sent5: Imagine the exoderm as the brave knight guarding the castle of the embryo.

meanings.definition: The outer layer of the skin.
meanings.sent1: Sunscreen helps protect the exoderm from harmful UV rays.
meanings.sent2: The exoderm acts as a barrier against external elements.
meanings.sent3: The exoderm enjoys feeling the warmth of the sun on a sunny day.
meanings.sent4: The exoderm is like a sturdy wall safeguarding the body's inner layers.
meanings.sent5: Take care of your exoderm to maintain healthy and glowing skin.
